name: Gates of Myrkridia
description:
A short RPG Maker VX Ace Lite game, set in one of many planes of existence connected by mystical portals. These portals are guarded by the Node Watch, an order of Paladins who protect against dangerous incursions and regulate travel through them. The player takes the role of Thandros, a non-affiliated young man whose affinity for dark magic gets him rounded up in the same group as one such danger, and is roped into helping the Node Watch deal with the problem to clear his name.

Specifications:

This game requires RPG Maker VX Ace (or Ace Lite) in order to play.

The folder with all game files is compressed in .rar format; you will need the WinRar file compression program in order to unpack it.

Disclaimer:

This game contains 4 imported music tracks. I do not own these tracks and am including them for entertainment purposes ONLY.
